system.description:
A salve or ointment which can be applied to reduce pain and speed recovery from injury, typically made from several natural herbal ingredients.

  • Use: Healing salve can be used in one of two ways: it can be applied using the Take Chem minor action, healing 2 HP immediately, or it can be applied as part of a First Aid action, adding +2 to the number of HP healed overall.
